Members Chapter Previous Next

class CGOBPopMenu : public CGOBWidgetParent

PopMenu is a popup widget that contains children widgets. PopMenu automatically adjusts itself to be big enough to hold all the children. This allows for any shaped widgets mixed together without a problem.

Usually the children will be CGOBButton with the WF_TRANSPARENTBG flag set.

Popups are handled in a special way by the manager much like the tooltip widget. GM.ActivatePopup() can be used to activate a popup widget which will be modal until an type of action occurs. The popup then removes itself.

#include "gobpopmenu.h"
